document_data.Description: Shederran wood possessed a distinctly pale green hue, supple and strong. Its tensile properties made it invaluable to the master craftsmen of [[Neverwinter]], who constructed the highest quality [[Shederran longbow|longbows]] and [[Shederran heavy crossbow|heavy crossbows]].
